totem/addon/mixins/cache/store_filter.coffee
Back to Guides
import ember from 'ember' export default ember.Mixin.create filter: (model_name, fn) -> new ember.RSVP.Promise (resolve, reject) => @store.filter(model_name, fn).then (filtered_store_records) => resolve(filtered_store_records) , (error) => @warn("Error in 'store_filter'.") reject(error)

store filter_ids.includes record.get(id_prop) ).then (filtered_store_records) => resolve(filtered_store_records) , (error) => reject(error)
